intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the second bugfix release in the stable 1.10 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.10.x. For a full list of bugfixes see Bugzilla.
See &site;/releases/1.10/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: udpsrc error: getsockname failed: could not get local address: Socket operation on non-socket
SAVP doesn't seem to work when restreaming an RTSP source
